Ethereum friends:  It’s *not* DeFi vs other Ethereum apps.   This is a false dichotomy.  It’s Ethereum vs centralized incumbents.  It will be a long journey, and the development of decentralized money & an open financial stack may be the first step, but it won’t be the last.
